titleStmt.title: Tvvo letters sent by Mr. Richard Osburn (late attendant on his Majesty in Carisbrook Castle), touching a design to poyson or make away his Majesty. Which letter were read in the House of Peers and communicated to the House of Commons, June 20. 1648. With an answer to the said letters, and a narrative of the whole designe.
titleStmt.author: Osborne, Richard, fl. 1648.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
